title: Prestigious Five-Bedroom Duplex with Private Garden Oasis in Pila’s Suburb
description: Live the life of comfort and prestige in this striking duplex spanning 210 sqm and comprising five generously sized bedrooms and two sophisticated bathrooms. The open-plan living and dining area seamlessly flows into a beautifully designed kitchen, exuding understated luxury. Expansive windows flood the home with natural sunlight, while the tasteful finishes elevate each detail, offering discerning residents a secluded haven just moments from urban excitement.
neighborhood_description: Located in Pila’s up-and-coming Suburb district, this residence combines the privacy of a tranquil neighborhood with the convenience of nearby fashionable shopping and diverse dining experiences. Professionals will enjoy swift highway access, and the polestar business district is only a short drive away—ideal for high-achieving work–life synergy.
lifestyle_benefits: close to dynamic shopping and restaurants
ideal setting for remote work and commuters
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals or executives relocating for work with families seeking a harmonious blend of luxury living, space, and convenient highway access to the local business district.
market_positioning: An exceptional opportunity in the premium segment, this duplex is a rare blend of contemporary amenities, discreet luxury, and proximity to major corporate and lifestyle hubs in Pila, commanding strong interest amid rising demand for spacious suburban residences.
